 2018-04782018-05-01,  ,  ND,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of HARRY JAMES KOWAL of Ottawa, Ontario, as Special Adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Principal of the Royal Military College of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a successor is appointed, whichever is earlier, effective August 1, 2018.
